node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，為上水石湖墟門診的診所運作助理，負責清潔工作，其中有一天於打鼓嶺普通科門診工作。患者與診所病人沒有直接接觸，也沒有接觸深喉唾液樣本， 4 月 3、4、6 及 7 日均有上班。 4 月 3 日出現喉嚨痛。衞生防護中心於 4 月 9 日確認患者夜間有在粉嶺必勝客及上水薄餅博士擔任清潔。
node.detail_en: The patient is a clinic operations assistant responsible for cleaning, mainly working at the Shek Wu Hui clinic in Sheung Shui and also, for a day, at the Ta Kwu Ling General Out-Patient Clinic. She did not interact with any other patients nor did she come into contact with any of the deep throat saliva samples. She went to work on April 3, 4, 6, and 7. She has good past health and no recent travel history. On April 3, she started having a sore throat. CHP confirmed on April 9 that the patient also provides janitorial services at Pizza Hut, Fanling and PHD Pizza, Sheung Shui.

node.location_en: Shek Wu Hui Municipal Services Building

node.location_zh: 海聯廣場地下 56A 號舖必勝客
node.location_en: Pizza Hut, Shop 56A, G/F, Union Plaza
node.remarks_zh: 患者在分店關門後才進入分店工作，不需接觸店內食物或客人。
node.remarks_en: The patient worked in the branch after opening hours and did not have contact with food or customers.

node.location_zh: 彩園邨彩珠樓地下 113 及 114 號舖薄餅博士
node.location_en: Shop 113-114, G/F, Choi Chu House, Choi Yuen Estate
node.remarks_zh: 患者在分店關門後才進入分店工作，不需接觸店內食物或客人。
node.remarks_en: The patient worked in the branch after opening hours and did not have contact with food or customers.
